infiniteOrchestra.goal: Continuously improve orchestrator reliability and performance for 24/7 operation. Focus on: 1) Adding periodic cleanup tasks, 2) Implementing task persistence, 3) Adding health checks, 4) Fixing memory leaks, 5) Adding circuit breakers

profiles.name: Vision Analyst
profiles.purpose: Analyze images, screenshots, diagrams, and visual content
profiles.whenToUse: When you need to understand visual content like screenshots, architecture diagrams, UI mockups, or error screenshots

profiles.name: Documentation Librarian
profiles.purpose: Research documentation, find examples, explain APIs and libraries
profiles.whenToUse: When you need to look up official documentation, find code examples, understand library APIs, or research best practices

profiles.name: Code Implementer
profiles.purpose: Write, edit, and refactor code with full tool access
profiles.whenToUse: When you need to actually write or modify code, create files, run commands, or implement features

profiles.name: Memory Graph Curator
profiles.purpose: Maintain a Neo4j-backed memory graph (project + global) and advise on context pruning
profiles.whenToUse: When you want to record durable project knowledge, track decisions and entities over time, or decide what context can be safely pruned

profiles.name: System Architect
profiles.purpose: Design systems, plan implementations, review architecture decisions
profiles.whenToUse: When you need to plan a complex feature, design system architecture, or make high-level technical decisions

profiles.name: Code Explorer
profiles.purpose: Quickly search and navigate the codebase
profiles.whenToUse: When you need to quickly find files, search for patterns, or locate specific code without deep analysis
